underlying_goal: The user felt that some items from a paper overhaul plan were not actually completed, and wanted Claude to verify the status and organize the remaining work.
primary_success: Synthesized a consolidated list of unaddressed tasks from multiple scattered spec and TODO files, providing a clear action plan.
brief_summary: The user pointed out that some planned paper overhaul tasks were incomplete. Claude reviewed multiple spec documents, confirmed several items were unaddressed, and created a consolidated list of pending experiments and open writing/framing questions. The agent updated the main decisions document to reflect the true status.
